name: Sunny Cup 2022 Demo
description:
This is a early 2022 Sunny Cup Demo. 

Sunny Cup is a drift-oriented 3rd person racing game. It focuses on easy-to-approach controls and highly competitive mechanics. Build your way to car culture or just let the flow of drifting take over!

 Sunny Cups core is the driving assist that helps player to focus on turn ins, brakings and takeovers, instead of trying to keep the car on track.  But don't let this fool you, adjust it to your liking and see how's your time on scoreboards!

This demo features:

  • Story mode
  • Arcade mode
  • 6(!!) different cars
  • Local multiplayer
  • AI drivers to compete against
  • Online scoreboards
  • Different game modes, including Chase and Cones
  • Bugs? Tell me (in Discord) if you find one!

 Please consider that the game is currently under development, and things like sound design is hardly a proof of concept. Also there are no way to rebind keys, maybe in next update?
